docs.abstract: Bill Clinton says Clinton Foundation will no longer accept foreign or corporate money and that he will resign from board if Hillary Clinton wins presidency; announcement follows Donald Trump's accusations that foreign donations affected Hillary Clinton's tenure as secretary of state and release of State Dept emails showing potential conflicts of interest.
